Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its unique features and high-quality materials, this product stands out as a top choice in its category. We believe it's worth more than just $150, but considering its exceptional quality, we're offering it to you at an introductory price of $180. This exclusive offer won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. If you have any questions or need further details, please let me know. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
